section.name: Introduction
section.p: Jervlet is a component wrapper for servlet containers. It allows you to treat your favorite servlet engine as a component in your container of choice, as well as treat your servlets as components too.

Jervlet currently supports the Jetty servlet container, and provides integration with Avalon, DNA and Picocontainer frameworks. The architecture follows the Inversion of Control (IoC) pattern and allows easy extension and adaptability to other frameworks.

Jervlet's target audience is developers that want to simplify the integration of servlets into their systems, and allow servlets to participate in the dependency resolution and lifecycle that your component framework provides.
